org.openremote.java.console.controller.service

Class ControllerDiscoveryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openremote.java.console.controller.service.ControllerDiscoveryService

  • public class ControllerDiscoveryService
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller discovery service for asynchronously discovering controllers within the current local area network.
    Author:
    Richard Turner

    • Method Detail

      • startDiscovery

        public static void startDiscovery(AsyncControllerDiscoveryCallback callback)
        Start Controller Discovery and use the specified callback for reporting progress. Discovery will continue until org.openremote.java.console.controller.service.stopDiscovery is called.
        Parameters:
        callback -

      • startDiscovery

        public static void startDiscovery(AsyncControllerDiscoveryCallback callback,
                  int searchDuration)
        Start Controller Discovery and use the specified callback for reporting progress. Discovery will run for the specified number of milliseconds
        Parameters:
        callback -
        searchDuration -

      • startDiscovery

        public static void startDiscovery(AsyncControllerDiscoveryCallback callback,
                  int searchDuration,
                  int tcpPort)
        Start Controller Discovery and use the specified callback for reporting progress. Discovery will run for the specified number of milliseconds on the specified TCP port.
        Parameters:
        callback -
        searchDuration -

      • stopDiscovery

        public static void stopDiscovery()
        Stop the currently running discovery service. The org.openremote.java.console.controller.AsyncControllerDiscoveryCallback.onDiscoveryStopped method of the callback supplied when discovery started will be called.

      • isDiscoveryRunning

        public static boolean isDiscoveryRunning()
        Check if discovery is currently running.
        Returns:
